doc:
Talia Balsam https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Talia_Balsam 0 Talia Balsam (born March 5, 1959) is an American television and film actress. She is the daughter of film actor Martin Balsam and actress Joyce Van Patten. She was formerly married to George Clooney and is currently married to John Slattery. Talia_Balsam ( born March_5_,_1959 ) is an_American_television_and_film_actress . She is the_daughter of film_actor_Martin_Balsam and actress_Joyce_Van_Patten . She was_formerly_married to George_Clooney and is_currently_married to John_Slattery .
